Nesys

Currently Learning ğŸŒ±
SICP and Scheme
SICP stands for the â€œStructure and Interpretation of Computer
Programsâ€ and itâ€™s bloody ridiculously good. It is essentially a course

Category Theory
Category Theory is a branch of mathematics and computer science that
allows us to mathematically model practically any program. This
allows us to write unimaginably robust and extensible code. Iâ€™m reading
Category Theory
for Programmers and recemmend it to anybody who wishes to dive into
the absolute depths of abstraction. Besides, itâ€™s good for the
mathematical muscles! ğŸ˜‰
